subject: Another 12.470 Ghost Box System on ebay ($55, 3 day)
author: M.A. Coletta (Mike)
full_text:
My first 12.470 Ghost Box System on ebay has sold.
Thank you to the person who bought it, and to all who bid.  I have now 
put a second 12.470 Ghost Box System on ebay.
Here is the link:
http://cgi.ebay.com/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewItem&item=170185204266

- Mike
